casebody.data:
BOLES, et al. v. TOWN OF OAK ISLAND 290A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 19, 2019

Norman B. Smith, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, For Traywick, Robert L., et al

Charles C. Meeker, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Town of Oak Island

Stephen V. Cary, Attorney at Law, For Town of Oak Island

Brian E. Edes, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, For Town of Oak Island

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of August 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of August 2019."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of September 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
